short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Create compelling emails with Mail Frames

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Mail Frames is your ultimate tool for creating beautiful, responsive email templates effortlessly. With our intuitive MJML editor and AI-powered design assistance, you can craft professional emails in minutes.

Use the Mail Frames chrome extension to inject responsive emails directly into gmail or martech platforms like Iterable or Klaviyo.
